subject: Hi all, question from a new comer ~ mic adapter?
author: lunalamia
full_text:
Hi all, new comer Laura here.

I have an older version digital voice recorder.
Panasonic RR-QR 160.
I have used it for regular evp, but now want to listen to recordings on 
my computer...an hopefully post them to the group.

This model has no usb, only 2 plug in holes on top, headphones and mic.
Is there an adapter cord of a sort that I can get to run from the mic 
in the voice recorder to the mic in the computer and record? 
I'd really like to actually use it and post, etc.  

If there is not, or no one knows of an adapter, anyone know of a better 
voice recorder to get that is cheap!  lol

I am in the middle of hacking a 20-125, thanks to some help from Bruce, 
and I want to record and post what I get .....

Any suggestions anyone? 
~ Laura
